result.reason: ODBC support for SQL-backed connection list storage is an in-scope extension of the existing MSSQL/MySQL database connector architecture.
result.approach: Implement an ODBC connector type and selection path, update SQL options and registry validation plus connection testing to handle it, and add integration coverage for ODBC-backed connection load/save.

attempts.raw_output: {"decision":"implement","reason":"ODBC support for SQL-backed connection list storage is an in-scope extension of the existing MSSQL/MySQL database connector architecture.","priority":"P3-enhancement","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/Config/DatabaseConnectors/DatabaseConnectorFactory.cs","mRemoteNG/Config/DatabaseConnectors/OdbcDatabaseConnector.cs","mRemoteNG/Config/DatabaseConnectors/DatabaseConnectionTester.cs","mRemoteNG/Config/Settings/Registry/OptRegistrySqlServerPage.cs","mRemoteNG/UI/Forms/OptionsPages/SqlServerPage.cs","mRemoteNGTests/Config/Connections/SqlConnectionsLoaderIntegrationTests.cs"],"approach":"Implement an ODBC connector type and selection path, update SQL options and registry validation plus connection testing to handle it, and add integration coverage for ODBC-backed connection load/save."}
